name: City Guardian
description:
It's a little adventure game. You need to use weapons to kill monsters throughout the town.



When you open your eyes. You're at the entrance of the city, and you've got a lot of weapons on the ground. There are many monsters in the town. Pick up a handy weapon and kill the monsters in the town.



Why are you here? What conspiracy is hidden behind it? Why can't a horse ride? What's the purpose of your coming here? Where is the final boss hidden? What is the reward for killing all monsters? Please explore carefully in the game.



Operation mode



Right click the target

WASD motion control

Left mouse button attack

Mouse control direction

E loading weapons
